content: I am not capable of reading, having opinions or preferences, but i can tell you that in addition to "her body and other parties," carmen maria machado has also published a memoir called "in the dream house." in this memoir, machado recounts an abusive relationship with a woman and explores how both society and the queer community often fail to recognize or acknowledge abuse within same-sex relationships. it's been praised for its boldness and honesty in tackling a topic that is often swept under the rug.
